entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed '!IsSSEOrAVXInstruction(ins)' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86.Program:ExtractInt32129()' during 'Generate code' #76343
    8.0.0
  • Refactor Code for AnyAll.cs file #76342
  • [API Proposal]: Operations on partial IDistributedCache key values #76340
  • Mono Bionic arm64 CI failure: No attached devices found #76336
  • Mono Bionic arm64 CI Failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests, not a valid Base-64 string #76333
  • WASM CI failure: Wasm.Browser.Threads.Sample - SharedArrayBuffer is not defined, exit code 71, GENERAL_FAILURE #76331
  • [mono][interpreter] Fix performance of new span helpers #76326
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 RC1 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #76320
    Future
  • Runtime_34937 and Runtime_33972 JITBlue runtime test failures on the rolling build #76314
  • [mono] crash in class-setup-vtable with re-abstracted covariant returns #76312
    7.0.0
  • DSACertificateExtensions is not supported on iOS #76305
    Future
  • GC does not collect all objects #76303
    Future
  • JIT: Dynamic VSD stub calls should also reuse indirection cell #76302
    8.0.0
  • GetEnumUnderlyingType() throws System.ExecutionEngineException for a System.Enum constrained generic type parameter #76300
  • The interop source generators generate an empty file if unused. #76298
  • Task.Run randomly fails when using ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow #76297
  • High CPU usage of application hosted as a docker container #76296
    8.0.0
  • GC picks wrong L3 cache size on Linux #76290
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime test suite does not always run the same number of tests #76285
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ChannelWriter<T>.WriteAsync(Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask<T>, CancellationToken) #76281
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector256\\Vector256_r\\Vector256_r.cmd #76280
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Simple one-shot hashing methods that produce the relevant type #76279
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Support immutable types in Microsoft.Extensions #47191
    Future
  • ConsoleLoggerProvider should work without an IOptionsMonitor #40261
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] IndexOutOfRangeException when running under perfview #75945
    8.0.0
  • signal SIGFPE during garbage collecting #76257
    8.0.0
  • Potential perf improvements for Mono AOT #76318
    8.0.0
  • FEATURE_GDBJIT fails to compile due to missing member of Module type #76291
  • Tar: string fields are truncated when they don't fit but we should throw instead #75921
    8.0.0
  • Tar: ustar entries with long name unable to roundtrip #75360
    8.0.0
  • TarWriter uses ASCII to write down fields and should use UTF8 instead #75482
    7.0.0
  • Support serialization of Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringValues #1559
    8.0.0
  • Vector128/256.Create(const ulong) uses slow software fallback on x86 #64784
    8.0.0
  • Bug in Hijri calendar #76301
  • [API Proposal]: Support Custom Data on `JsonSerializerOptions` #71718
    8.0.0
  • [Bug]: At runtime sometimes the wrong overload is selected. #75069
    Future
  • Arm64 improvements for Mono #70558
    7.0.0
  • [Mono-Arm64] Create smaller mobile applications by refactoring code #70561
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Nodes.Tests.JsonArrayTests.HeterogeneousArray - asserts #73538
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add nullable annotation to INumberBase<>.TryParse #76260
    7.0.0
  • [Bug] System.Text.Json can't parse Json ( returned from server using Python json.dumps() ) ? #76130
  • Using hostfxr_initialize_for_runtime_config returns code: 2147450733 #76292
  • sendtohelixhelp.proj always includes openssl as a Helix correlation payload #75080
    8.0.0
  • source-build TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable don't flow through to the native scripts #74577
  • CI Failure: No templates or subcommands found matching: 'wasmbrowser' #76269
  • RyuJIT SIMD: optimize SIMD codegen since SSE/AVX allow the second operand to be a memory-op #6712
    Future
  • Support value numbering of SIMD types in RyuJIT optimizer #5859
    Future
  • The DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate throws InvalidProgramException #76278

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Fix too wide loads on arm64 for small structs #76341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) implemented #76337
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] For beforefieldinit classes, only field accesses trigger … #76335
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] fix div by zero in gen size calculation #76334
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Updating owners #76330
    area-Meta
  • Dispose key when importing X.509 PEM #76329
    area-System.Security
  • Split runtime-extra-platforms into distinct pipelines #76328
  • [release/6.0] [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76327
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • perfcollect docs: run two commands instead of three #76325
    documentation, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76324
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76323
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Use UTF8 encoding on Tar string fields #76322
    area-System.IO
  • Make KeysCollection.ContainsKey methods public. #76319
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Implement ChaCha20Poly1305 with CryptoKit on macOS #76317
    area-System.Security
  • Distributed transaction fixes #76310
    area-System.Transactions
  • [wasm] Delete malformed package.json used for tests, it confuses Component Governance tooling #76309
    area-Build-mono
  • [WIP] HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #76307
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Gradual decommit in wks #76306
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix #76260 Add nullable annotation to INumberBase<>.TryParse #76304
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Initialize beforefieldinit classes when AOT methods are l… #76295
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing fixes for the arcade bump PR #76289
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Adding a debug only config knob for testing loop unrolling limits #76288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: optimize redundant branches by looking through phis #76283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BCrypt for ephemeral RSA on Windows #76277
    area-System.Security

Merged

  • Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #76109
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [release/7.0] Replace GetFile() with GetPEAssembly() call in gdb #76321
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Disable firefox CI job on 7.0 branch, since the tests are know… #76308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix isolated storage path on mobile #76254
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76052
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Enable EventSource support in crossgen2 #76056
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Replace sign extending moves to normal moves #75837
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • More disasm check CI fixes #76276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Don't run SPMI unit test if it appears a SPMI collection is in progress #76311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix div by zero in gen size calculation #76294
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Support create, debugging and running wasmbrowser template from VS #76113
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] JIT: Fix segfault for modulo computations involving address-of expressions #76171
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use UTF8 encoding on Tar string fields #75902
    area-System.IO
  • Replace GetFile() with GetPEAssembly() call in gdb #76293
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Remove VS nupkg push #76313
    area-Infrastructure-installer, 7.0.0
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove duplicate length words from xmldoc #76315
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Add missing xml documentation #76191
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Cache KeySizes array for EC types #76156
    area-System.Security
  • Make "Personal" on Android also point to a Documents folder #76250
    area-System.Runtime, os-android, community-contribution
  • Update disasm-checks documentation #76286
  • Add `$schema` to `cgmanifest.json` #74933
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use existing variable for SpecialFolder.UserProfile on Android #76299
  • Fix #76260 Add nullable annotation to INumberBase<>.TryParse #76272
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Only bundle OpenSSL Android on actual Bionic builds #76266
  • [mono][llvm] Avoid making the 'this' variable in gshared methods vola… #76284
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Run System.Runtime tests in a deterministic order to work arou… #76287
    arch-wasm
  • Align repro project settings with SDK defaults #76233
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Increase number of Apple trampolines to 40000 #76246
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove IlcTrimMetadata=false from a couple tests #76234
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix diagnostic for properties on instantiated types #76227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Disable asm checking for JITMinOpts #76345
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement AuthenticationTagMismatchException exception #75160
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Discount committed when checking for sufficient space #76217
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure end_gen0_region_space is always computed #76214
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Updating Vector256 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector128<T> ops #76221
    area-System.Numerics
  • Decommit free regions when close to OutOfMemory #76216
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC: Fix CheckPromoted for frozen objects #76251
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix not to create unnecessary `thread_params` #76007
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make sure we at least sweep the loh even when we wanted to compact it #74626
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • global.json: Bump sdk to 7.0.100-rtm.22476.1 to pick up a msbuild fix #76220
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Bump the runtime net6 versions for GA #76270
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Testing a compiler change #76265
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection
  • [release/7.0] WasmAppHost: Fix crash when starting wasmbrowser project #76236
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Add custom ResponseFile handler #76271
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SPMI: Improve speed significantly for large diffs #76238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Smarter ordering of late args based on register uses #76017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Disable NativeAOT subset for source-build. #76206
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update templates to work for multiple versions #76124
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Removing short name column from compphases.h #76030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add List<T> AddRange, InsertRange, and CopyTo extensions for spans #76274
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove GT_ADDEX and replace with more generalized containment handling #76273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Check if the string is null first before checking if it is a file #76190
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • update arm32 test queues for msquic #76267
    arch-arm32, area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • Fix distribute free regions #74916
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [tests] Disable source generator tests mobile #75609
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Cross-compile Wasm cross-compilers for ARM64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix value type with static method fails to load #76262
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Reduce Enum.GetEnumName overheads #76162
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Audit MemoryExtensions.IndexOf variants #75754
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Simplify type info resolver assignment #76275
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Tests for static inherited members. #75512
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to use latest sdk, and target net8.0 #75998
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Notify debugger about empty URLs #76187
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
